resources.title: Claude Code for VS Code
resources.description: Transform your VS Code experience with Claude AI. Get intelligent code suggestions, explanations, and assistance directly in your editor with this powerful extension.

resources.title: Claude API SDK
resources.description: Comprehensive SDK supporting Python, JavaScript, Go, and Ruby for easy Claude API integration. Includes rate limiting, error handling, and streaming support.

resources.title: Claude GitHub Action
resources.description: GitHub Action that automatically reviews pull requests using Claude AI. Get intelligent feedback on code quality, security issues, and improvement suggestions.

resources.title: Claude for Raycast
resources.description: Raycast extension that brings Claude AI to your fingertips on macOS. Quick queries, code explanations, and AI assistance without leaving your workflow.

resources.title: Claude CLI Tool
resources.description: Powerful CLI tool that brings Claude AI directly to your terminal. Execute queries, process files, and integrate Claude into your development workflow with simple commands.

resources.title: Claude Discord Bot
resources.description: Smart Discord bot powered by Claude AI. Help community members with coding questions, provide explanations, and facilitate technical discussions in your server.

resources.title: Claude Docker Assistant
resources.description: Intelligent Docker assistant that helps you create, optimize, and troubleshoot Docker containers. Generate Dockerfiles, docker-compose configurations, and best practices.

resources.title: Claude Obsidian Plugin
resources.description: Obsidian plugin that integrates Claude AI for intelligent note-taking. Generate summaries, create connections between notes, and enhance your knowledge management workflow.

resources.title: Claude Jupyter Kernel
resources.description: Custom Jupyter kernel that integrates Claude AI for data science and research. Get intelligent code suggestions, data analysis insights, and explanation of complex algorithms.

resources.title: Claude API Postman Collection
resources.description: Comprehensive Postman collection with all Claude API endpoints, example requests, and automated tests. Perfect for API testing and integration development.

resources.title: Claude Slack Bot
resources.description: Integrate Claude AI into your team's Slack workspace. Ask questions, get code reviews, and collaborate with AI assistance directly in your chat channels.

resources.title: Claude Terraform Provider
resources.description: Terraform provider that uses Claude AI to generate, validate, and optimize infrastructure code. Automatically create secure and efficient Terraform configurations.
